2502.name: COUNTRY_MISMATCH
2502.message:
Online features cannot be used because
the country settings on the Wii U
console and the Nintendo Network ID
do not match.

Check the Wii U System Settings to
ensure that your country of residence
has been selected under country
settings. 

If the country setting is correct, create
a new user on the Wii U and link it to a
Nintendo Network ID that is valid in
your country of residence.
